member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.PropertyHelper.GetProperties(System.Reflection.TypeInfo)
member.summary: Creates and caches fast property helpers that expose getters for every public get property on the underlying type.
member.param: The type info to extract property accessors for.
member.returns: A cached array of all public properties of the specified type.

member.summary: Creates and caches fast property helpers that expose getters for every public get property on the specified type.
member.param: The type to extract property accessors for.
member.returns: A cached array of all public properties of the specified type.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.PropertyHelper.GetVisibleProperties(System.Reflection.TypeInfo)

summary.para: Creates and caches fast property helpers that expose getters for every non-hidden get property on the specified type.
excludes properties defined on base types that have been hidden by definitions using the new keyword.

member.param: The type info to extract property accessors for.
member.returns: A cached array of all public properties of the specified type.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.PropertyHelper.GetVisibleProperties(System.Type)

summary.para: Creates and caches fast property helpers that expose getters for every non-hidden get property on the specified type.
excludes properties defined on base types that have been hidden by definitions using the new keyword.

member.param: The type to extract property accessors for.
member.returns: A cached array of all public properties of the specified type.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.PropertyHelper.MakeFastPropertyGetter(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Creates a single fast property getter. The result is not cached.
member.param: propertyInfo to extract the getter for.
member.remarks: This method is more memory efficient than a dynamically compiled lambda, and about the same speed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.PropertyHelper.MakeNullSafeFastPropertyGetter(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Creates a single fast property getter which is safe for a null input object. The result is not cached.
member.param: propertyInfo to extract the getter for.
member.remarks: This method is more memory efficient than a dynamically compiled lambda, and about the same speed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.PropertyHelper.MakeFastPropertySetter(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Creates a single fast property setter for reference types. The result is not cached.
member.param: propertyInfo to extract the setter for.
member.remarks: This method is more memory efficient than a dynamically compiled lambda, and about the same speed. This only works for reference types.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.PropertyHelper.ObjectToDictionary(System.Object)
member.summary:
Given an object, adds each instance property with a public get method as a key and its associated value to a dictionary.
If the object is already an instance, then a copy is returned.
member.remarks: The implementation of PropertyHelper will cache the property accessors per-type. This is faster when the same type is used multiple times with ObjectToDictionary.

summary.para: An type that designates an optional parameter for the purposes of ASP.NET Web API action overloading. Optional parameters do not participate in overloading, and do not have to have a value for the action to be selected.

member.name: P:System.Web.Http.HttpError.Message
member.summary: The high-level, user-visible message explaining the cause of the error. Information carried in this field should be considered public in that it will go over the wire regardless of the value of error detail policy. As a result care should be taken not to disclose sensitive information about the server or the application.

member.name: P:System.Web.Http.HttpError.ModelState
member.summary: The containing information about the errors that occurred during model binding.
member.remarks: The inclusion of information carried in the is controlled by the error detail policy. All other information in the should be considered public in that it will go over the wire. As a result care should be taken not to disclose sensitive information about the server or the application.

member.name: P:System.Web.Http.HttpError.MessageDetail
member.summary: A detailed description of the error intended for the developer to understand exactly what failed.
member.remarks: The inclusion of this field is controlled by the error detail policy. The field is expected to contain information about the server or the application that should not be disclosed broadly.

member.name: P:System.Web.Http.HttpError.ExceptionMessage
member.summary: The message of the if available.
member.remarks: The inclusion of this field is controlled by the error detail policy. The field is expected to contain information about the server or the application that should not be disclosed broadly.

member.name: P:System.Web.Http.HttpError.ExceptionType
member.summary: The type of the if available.
member.remarks: The inclusion of this field is controlled by the error detail policy. The field is expected to contain information about the server or the application that should not be disclosed broadly.

member.name: P:System.Web.Http.HttpError.StackTrace
member.summary: The stack trace information associated with this instance if available.
member.remarks: The inclusion of this field is controlled by the error detail policy. The field is expected to contain information about the server or the application that should not be disclosed broadly.

member.remarks: The inclusion of this field is controlled by the error detail policy. The field is expected to contain information about the server or the application that should not be disclosed broadly.
